identity.name: Ventur
identity.description: A high-contrast, precision-engineered design system for startup founders. It blends the raw energy of 'Electric Orange' with the serious, data-heavy reliability of 'Obsidian Black'. It avoids generic SaaS tropes by using condensed typography and sharp, architectural grids.
principles: Fusion: Industrial Brutalism x Fintech Precision
Content: Data is the art. Charts and metrics take center stage.
Contrast: Extreme. 100% Black vs 100% White vs Electric Orange.

universal_guidelines: Use 'Oswald' for all headings. If it feels too aggressive, reduce weight, not font family.
Use 'Manrope' for all body text. It must be legible at small sizes.
Primary Color #FF4F00 is for ACTION only. Do not use it for backgrounds unless it's a small badge or accent.
Dark Mode is the default experience. Light mode is secondary.
Borders are critical. Use 1px borders with 10-15% opacity to define structure in dark mode.
No rounded corners on main containers. Keep it sharp (rounded-none or rounded-sm).
All interactive elements must have data-testid attributes.
Do not use generic gradients. Use solid colors or subtle noise textures.
Spacing: Use p-8 or p-12 for section padding. Don't cram content.
instructions_to_main_agent: You are building 'Ventur'. Follow the 'Industrial Futurist' aesthetic. Implement the CSS variables in index.css immediately. Use the provided image URLs for the respective sections. Ensure the dashboard uses a Bento Grid layout. For the Pitch Deck Analyzer, use a split-screen layout (Upload on left, Analysis on right). For the Data Room, use a dense table layout with quick filters.
